Real Madrid Club

  • Official Website


History

Real Madrid Club de Fútbol is a professional football club based in Madrid, Spain.
The club was formed in 1902 as Madrid Football Club, and played its first competitive match on 13 May 1902.

Gallery

Achievements

  • 14 UEFA Champions League Titles
  • 35 La Liga Titles
  • 19 Copa del Rey Titles
  • 7 FIFA Club World Cups
